data.title: MetaFund: Impact Investing
data.meta_description: Investing in Businesses, Developers, and Nonprofits to Create Sustainable Social Impact.
data.text:
Investing in

Businesses, Developers & Nonprofits

to Create

Sustainable Social Impact

Our Loan Programs

MetaFund provides flexible financing to create quality jobs, affordable housing, health and educational services, or other direct benefits to communities.

New Markets Tax Credits (NMTC)

Small Business

Oklahoma Impact

Investing Collaborative

Not Sure Which Loan Program is Right for You?

Take this short questionnaire to figure out how MetaFund could potentially support you.

A Just World Free From Poverty

MetaFund is an Oklahoma-based 501(c)(3) nonprofit and Community Development Financial Institution (CDFI) working with other nonprofits, the private sector, and government toward a just world free from poverty. We invest in creative solutions for communities, with a primary focus on quality jobs, affordable housing, community health, and child wellbeing. Together, we co-create sustainable social impact.

Our Focus

“MetaFund helped finance the purchase of medical equipment which allowed us to create much-needed jobs and improve access to care for our community.”

— Alan Lovelace, CFO, Stillwater Medical Center

Contact Us

Fill out the contact form and one of our business development professionals will reach out to provide you with more information about our products and services.
